title: This justice system is the worst ive seen in a video game yet
body: Once again, I get reported and have chat privileges revoked for nothing. I don't play the game the way some 12 year old flamer wants me to and I'm actually punnished?! This is just getting ridiculous now...

replies.body:
It takes more than one game, and one report to get a chat ban. Unfortunately, Riot cannot look at chat logs from every single game, so they rely on reports.

But it does take quite a lot of reports to get a chat restriction in the first place. I find it hard to believe that you don't deserve it.
You even got the name of the system wrong, shows how much you know about it lol.
sucks to be you then. you probably are toxic in game anyway.
